passes.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct
passes.help: Heading levels should only increase by one

ancestry: html > body > div > div > header:nth-child(1) > section > h1:nth-child(1)
html > body > div > div > header:nth-child(1) > section > h2:nth-child(2)
html > body > div > div > main:nth-child(2) > section:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(1) > h2:nth-child(2)
html > body > div > div > main:nth-child(2) > section:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > h2:nth-child(2)

any.message: Heading order valid

passes.help: Links with the same name must have a similar purpose
